mapper.select: SELECT m.mmbrNo AS memberId, IFNULL(m.nickNm, '') AS nickname, m.temporarilyJoined, m.mmbrTypeCd AS memberTypeCode, IFNULL(m.intrdctn, '') AS introduction, IFNULL(m.prflImgFileNm, '') AS profileImageFileName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM playMmbr pm1 WHERE pm1.mmbrNo = m.mmbrNo ) AS playCount FROM mmbr m WHERE m.useYn = 'Y' AND m.mmbrNo = #{memberId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mmbr ( email, nickNm, pswrd, pswrdErrCnt, mmbrTypeCd,
invtMmbrNo,
useYn, temporarilyJoined, insId, insDt, updId, updDt ) VALUES ( encVal(#{email}), TRIM(#{nickNm}), SHA2(#{pswrd}, 256), 0, '1',
#{invtMmbrNo},
'Y', #{temporarilyJoined}, 'system', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'system', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT m.mmbrNo, m.pswrdErrCnt, IF(m.pswrd = SHA2(#{pswrd}, 256), 'Y', 'N') AS pswrdYn FROM mmbr m WHERE m.email = encVal(#{email})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mmbrLog ( mmbrNo, mmbrIp, logDt ) VALUES ( #{mmbrNo}, #{mmbrIp}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update:
UPDATE mmbr SET
email = encVal(#{email}),
nickNm = TRIM(#{nickNm}),
pswrd = SHA2(#{pswrd}, 256),
mmbrTypeCd = #{mmbrTypeCd},
intrdctn = TRIM(#{intrdctn}),
prflImgFileNm = TRIM(#{prflImgFileNm}),
useYn = #{useYn},
pswrdErrCnt = IFNULL(pswrdErrCnt, 0) + 1,
pswrdErrCnt = 0,
updId = 'system', updDt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE mmbrNo = #{mmbrNo}
mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(m.mmbrNo) > 0, 'Y', 'N') AS existYn FROM mmbr m WHERE m.email = encVal(TRIM(#{email}))
